languageKey.label: Click the following checkboxes to display or to hide the corresponding broken links.
Path to the content element, which contains the broken link.
Type of the element containing the broken link. Hover over the icons to see the table and uid of the record.
Headline of the element with the broken link.
Field of the element in which the broken link is located.
The linking text.
URL to which the broken link is pointing.
Status of that link.
Date and time of the last update of the information in each table row.
